title: BBC Tomorrows Food 2of3 Ocado 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVGroup.org
description:
Tomorrow's Food

Science Documentary hosted by Dara O Briain and Angela Hartnett and Shini Somara and Chris Bavin, published by BBC in 2015 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/9/97/Tomorrow-s-Food-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Tomorrows Food 
Dara O Briain reveals the awe-inspiring future of our food. To bring us the amazing innovations that will soon be on our dinner plates, he's joined by a team of experts.
"This should be a 3 episode series, but episode 3 was not aired due to the ISIS attack on France on Dec 7th 2015, as soon as it is aired a will upload it " Harry65


1)  Thanet Earth 
Michelin-starred chef Angela Hartnett tackles sell-by dates with the US military, greengrocer Chris Bavin heads to Australia to see the world's leading robotic farm, technology expert Shini Somara is in Shanghai, where she's immersed in the restaurant of the future, and Dara is in Britain's largest hi-tech farm to see the secret of growing hundreds of thousands of tonnes of fruit and veg - without any soil.

2)  Ocado 
In this second episode Dara O Briain continues to reveal the awe-inspiring future of our food. He's joined by Michelin-starred chef Angela Hartnett, who meets a robot that can mimic all the moves of a top chef. Dr Shini Somara heads to Japan to discover if technology can beat willpower in the battle of the bulge, greengrocer Chris Bavin finds out if the British public will ever accept insects as an appetising snack, and Dara discovers how forensic science is tackling the billion-pound business of food fraud. This series will change the way we think about the food we grow, buy and eat.
